Simple generator¶

class data.generators.simple_data_generators.simple_3D_data_generator(X=None, d_path=None, batch_size=1, seed=42, shuffle_each_epoch=False)[source]¶

Bases: tensorflow.python.keras.utils.data_utils.Sequence

3D ImageDataGenerator.

Parameters

  • d_path (Str) – Path to load the data from.

  • seed (int, optional) – Seed for random functions.

  • batch_size (int, optional) – Size of the batches.

  • shuffle_each_epoch (bool, optional) – To shuffle data after each epoch.

Methods

on_epoch_end()

Updates indexes after each epoch.
